channel.title: Everything but 1
channel.description:
okay to keep this simple, ive made a server and it works fine at my house using the no-ip adress i made pur3pkz.servegame.com, it also works on the computer downstairs which is connected to the same router, but when i try to upload it to the moparscape server page it says it is offline, and when i ask my friends to try it at their houses it says error connecting to server, i followed the portforwarding guide and the how to create a runescape private server guide the best that i could and it works for me but not for other people.
ive added a few pictures of what is happening with some comments in them please help me if you can! :) use the links below to see the pictures because i got an error when trying to attach them something about the file name being the same... ;)
http://www.bartscape.com/login.bmp http://www.bartscape.com/ingame.bmp http://www.bartscape.com/friendsfail.bmp http://www.bartscape.com/signup1.bmp http://www.bartscape.com/signupfail.bmp
SORRY ACCIDENTLY DOUBLE POSTED!
